--- create_or_replace_function.sql
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION my_func() RETURNS INT64 AS (1)
--- AST
&ast.CreateFunction{
  As:        51,
  RparenAs:  56,
  OrReplace: true,
  Name:      &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 27,
        NameEnd: 34,
        Name:    "my_func",
      },
    },
  },
  ReturnType: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
    NamePos: 45,
    Name:    "INT64",
  },
  Definition: &ast.IntLiteral{
    ValuePos: 55,
    ValueEnd: 56,
    Base:     10,
    Value:    "1",
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION my_func () RETURNS INT64 AS (1)
